title: 85/208/EEC: Commission Decision of 25 March 1985 amending Decision 80/686/EEC setting up an Advisory Committee on the Control and Reduction of Pollution Caused by Hydrocarbons Discharged at Sea
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 25 March 1985
amending Decision 80/686/EEC setting up an Advisory Committee on the Control and Reduction of Pollution Caused by Hydrocarbons Discharged at Sea
(85/208/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the title, in Articles 1 and 2 (1) and (2) of Decision 80/686/EEC, 'hydrocarbons discharged at sea' is replaced by 'oil and other harmful substances discharged at sea'.
This Decision shall apply from 25 March 1985.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 March 1985.
For the Commission
S. CLINTON DAVIS
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 162, 19. 6. 1981, p. 4.
(2) OJ No L 188, 16. 7. 1984, p. 7.
(3) OJ No L 188, 22. 7. 1980, p. 11.
